name: nextjs-cdk-amplify-starter
description: A starting point for some [GOSPEL](https://www.getrevue.co/profile/lzrs/issues/introducing-gospel-global-open-source-permissionless-enterprise-league-676392)-related apps. Technologies: TypeScript, Next.js 11, Tailwind CSS, Eslint, Prettier, CDK, Amplify. The CDK is adapted from [this repo](https://github.com/dabit3/next.js-cdk-amplify-workshop).
author: LZRS
